data.title: Indian 2: Kamal Haasan follows director Shankar
data.meta_description: Kamal Haasan: Indian 2: Kamal Haasan follows director Shankar
data.text:
Universal Actor Kamal Haasan, needs no introdauction or any adjective to praise his body of work. He attained ‘Legendary’ status in Indian Film industry. Kamal is an actor, writer, director, singer, editor, TV shows presenter and Politician. He worked predominantly in Tamil and some what in Telugu. He also acted in Hindi, Kannada, Malayalam and Bengali.

Currently, he is playing in the lead role in Shankar’s highly-anticipated movie, Indian 2. Reportedly, the film has wrapped up its entire shooting formalities a few weeks Meanwhile, a on location picture from Indian 2 started circulating on social media platforms. In the picture, Kamal Haasan is seen wisely listening to the director before performing a high voltage emotional scene. Those who happened to witness the picture on social media are openly commenting that ‘Universal Actor is a Good listener’ and the same reciprocate in his acting skills.

Advertisement

Coming back to Indian 2, the movie went on floors in 2019 is a well established news. After going through many hurdles, the shooting resumed last year. Co-starring Kajal Aggarwal, Rakul Preet Singh, Priya Shankar and Siddharth in key roles, Indian 2 is being bankrolled by Lyca Productions, Red Giant Movies is co- producing it on a lavish note, the prestigious project is expected to hit the screens in the second half of 2024.
